Even though the author is straight and heteroflexible, the way they handled the ending of the arrangement could have been hurtful. The author might not have clearly communicated their boundaries from the start, leading the friend to have unrealistic expectations.

So, while there's no malice, the author might be at fault for not managing the situation with more care and clarity, leading the friend to feel led on. Therefore, the answer might be A (the author is in the wrong).
